news.title: Oberoi Realty's net profit up 64.07% in Q4 FY24
news.para: Oberoi Realty's net consolidated total income stood at Rs 1,558.56 crore in Q4 FY24, a growth of 56.62 per cent from Rs 995.11 crore it recorded in the similar quarter last year.

news.title: Bajaj Electricals' net profit down 43.4% to Rs 29 crore in Q4 FY24
news.para: Consolidated total revenue from operations in the quarter under review was Rs 1,188.08 crore as compared to Rs 1,291.97 crore in the same period a year ago, it added.

news.title: Home prices in New Zealand fall by 2.1% in April 2024
news.para: Seasonally adjusted median house prices dipped 2.1% from March but were up 2.6% from a year earlier, continuing a trend seen in recent months, REINZ data showed.

news.title: Banks in Hong Kong face credit risks from property downturn: Report
news.para: With over half of their total loan portfolios tied to real estate, Hong Kong banks are heavily exposed to the property sector through lending for property development, investment, and residential mortgages, the report said.

news.title: Repco Home Finance's net profit up 31.63% in Q4 FY24
news.para: Repco Home Finance's net consolidated total income stood at Rs 397.19 crore in Q4 FY24, a growth of 15.55 per cent from Rs 343.73 crore it recorded in the similar quarter last year.

news.title: China's Agile Group misses interest payment on $483 million offshore note
news.para: The grace period for the interest payment on the $483 million 6.05% senior notes due 2025, issued in November 2020, had expired on Monday.

news.title: Spain’s Ferrovial reports 37.6% rise in earnings in Q1 2024
news.para: Ferrovial's adjusted earnings before interest, taxes, depreciation and amortisation (EBITDA) reached 254 million euros ($274.02 million), in line with average analysts' expectations of 253.4 million euros.

news.title: Shree Cement's net profit increases by 21.15% in Q4 FY24
news.para: Shree Cement's net consolidated total income stood at Rs 5,238.88 crore in Q4 FY24, a growth of 6.47 per cent from Rs 4,920.38 crore it recorded in the similar quarter last year.

news.title: Spain’s Colonial posts net profit of $58.81 million in Q1 2024
news.para: Real estate companies such as Colonial and Spanish peer Merlin Properties earn profit on the rental of their assets and are required to include the impact of an updated valuation of their properties every six months in their results.

news.title: MahaRERA proposes self-declaration of project quality by builders
news.para: MahaRERA has proposed that realty developers provide an annual self-declaration on projects' quality assurance to ensure structural integrity, material quality, and workmanship standards.

news.title: Table Space leases over 2.5 million sq ft in Chennai, Mumbai, Hyderabad & Bengaluru
news.para: Table Space plans to add another 500,000 sq ft in Mumbai in the next 12 months, an additional 500,000 sq ft over the next 12 months in Hyderabad and 500,000 sq ft in the Whitefield, Bengaluru.

news.title: Shriram Finance to sell its housing finance subsidiary to Warburg Pincus
news.para: Warburg Pincus will acquire the stake through its affiliate Mango Crest Investment from all the sellers. The proposed transaction is valued at Rs 4,630 crore for equity and convertible instruments of Shriram Housing Finance.

news.title: Hero Realty's CEO Dharmesh Shah resigns
news.para: He became the CEO of Hero Realty, promoted by Sunil Kant Munjal's Hero Enterprise, in March 2022.

news.title: DLF's net profit increases by 61.49% in Q4 FY24
news.para: DLF's net consolidated total income stood at Rs 2,316.70 crore in Q4 FY24, a growth of 47.03 per cent from Rs 1,575.70 crore it recorded in the similar quarter last year.

news.title: GIC Housing Finance's net profit up 2.56% in Q4 FY24
news.para: GIC Housing Finance's net consolidated total income stood at Rs 265.54 crore in Q4 FY24, a dip of 7.61 per cent from Rs 287.40 crore it recorded in the similar quarter last year.

news.title: L&T may exit Hyderabad metro as free bus rides hurt business
news.para: The Telangana government's free bus ride scheme for women has led to a decrease in Hyderabad Metro's ridership, prompting L&T to contemplate exiting the project. L&T faces financial concerns as the metro project is now classified as a non-core asset.

news.title: South Korea tightens scrutiny to speed up real estate restructuring
news.para: House prices in South Korea have been falling since June, 2023, as high interest rates weighed on demand, and worries about debt repayments at construction firms have grown after a mid-sized builder's decision in December to reschedule its debt.

news.title: NCLAT halts ATS project's insolvency process
news.para: NCLAT paused CIRP for ATS Group's Knightsbridge project in Sector 124, allowing time for responses and construction supervision under Sunil Gaur. Rera funds utilized, pending final disposal of appeals.

news.title: Shapoorji Pallonji Group seeks time to clear payments from bondholders
news.para: The company is required to pay around 14 billion rupees ($167.62 million) to bondholders of Goswami Infratech when it services the debt of another group company Sterling Investment Corp.

news.title: Cera Sanitaryware's net profit up 61.49% in Q4 FY24
news.para: Cera Sanitaryware's net consolidated total income stood at Rs 564.52 crore in Q4 FY24, a growth of 3.63 per cent from Rs 544.72 crore it recorded in the similar quarter last year.
